#summary List of projects availables on this site

*autosettings* is a Google Code site that contains the following projects:

|| *[Timeriffic]* || *[Flashlight]* || *[Brighteriffic]* ||
|| <img src="http://autosettings.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/AutoSettings/res/drawable/timeriffic_icon.png" align="left"> *Timeriffic* does one thing: it can mute or un-mute the global Android ringer at a specified time of the day. <br> Click here for [Timeriffic more information on *Timeriffic*]. || <img src="http://autosettings.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Flashlight/res/drawable/bright_icon.png" align="left"> *Flashlight for Cupcake* is a flashlight application that _actually_ works on Android 1.5 "cupcake". <br> Click here for [Flashlight more information on *Flashlight*]. ||<img src="http://autosettings.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Brighteriffic/res/drawable/icon.png" align="left"> * Brighteriffic* is an application to toggle the global screen brightness. <br> Click here for [Brighteriffic more information on *Brighteriffic*]. ||
